snippet.title: CULTIC - Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
The CULTIC demo is now available on Steam (you can expect the update to drop at 10AM Pacific / 12PM Central, coinciding with the beginning of the festival)!

Check out the updated demo created for the Steam Next Fest featuring an overhauled playable map, wave-based Survival Mode, refined combat and graphics, and weapon upgrades.

Wishlist CULTIC on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684930/CULTIC/

The first thing you'll do... is die. For you, however, death is only the beginning.
Tuck your guts back in and gear up to fight your way through the ranks of a mysterious and violent cult. Their wretched minds further twisted by the will of an unseen entity, you'll find just as much lead flying back as you send, so you'll have to run, slide, dodge, and make use of your environment to survive in this old-school-inspired shooter.

https://3drealms.com/
https://slipgate-studios.com/

#CULTIC #FPS
